name: kobozo-plugins
description: Kobozo's custom Claude Code plugins for UI development and style guide management

plugins.name: ui-checker
plugins.description: Automated UI validation and creation - validate against style guides with Playwright, create beautiful React components with Tailwind CSS, manage design systems following Loveable's approach

plugins.name: api-documenter
plugins.description: Automatically generate and maintain API documentation with OpenAPI/Swagger specs and human-readable docs

plugins.name: test-suite-generator
plugins.description: Generate comprehensive test suites with high coverage - unit tests, integration tests, and coverage analysis

plugins.name: security-auditor
plugins.description: Scan for security vulnerabilities, check dependencies, and validate authentication/authorization implementations

plugins.name: performance-optimizer
plugins.description: Analyze and optimize application performance - identify bottlenecks, reduce bundle sizes, and optimize database queries

plugins.name: data-privacy-manager
plugins.description: Manage data privacy compliance - GDPR audits, data anonymization, privacy policy generation, and consent management

plugins.name: db-schema-manager
plugins.description: Manage database schemas - analyze relationships, generate migrations, detect issues, and design optimal data models

plugins.name: i18n-manager
plugins.description: Manage internationalization - extract translations, validate locales, optimize i18n configuration, and detect missing translations

plugins.name: onboarding-assistant
plugins.description: Create interactive user onboarding experiences - guided tours, product walkthroughs, tooltips, and step-by-step flows

plugins.name: code-architect
plugins.description: Generate comprehensive architecture documentation with dependency graphs, visualizations, C4 models, UML diagrams, and system design docs using MCP servers

plugins.name: clean-code-checker
plugins.description: Detect code duplication, identify code smells, enforce clean code principles (SOLID, DRY), and provide refactoring recommendations using jscpd, ESLint, and SonarQube MCP

plugins.name: documentation-writer
plugins.description: Generate comprehensive technical documentation for GitHub wikis - write feature docs, API references, architecture guides, and tutorials to ./docs directory

plugins.name: bug-fixer
plugins.description: Comprehensive bug fixing workflow - analyze root causes, design robust fixes, validate with tests, prevent regressions using specialized agents

plugins.name: docker-compose-manager
plugins.description: Manage Docker Compose environments with nginx routing - orchestrate multi-service stacks, configure reverse proxy, monitor services using Docker MCP

plugins.name: brainstorm
plugins.description: Research-driven brainstorming tool - explore ideas with web research and codebase analysis, generate comprehensive implementation specifications without changing code

plugins.name: dead-code-detector
plugins.description: Detect and eliminate unutilized code blocks, unused functions, dead imports, and obsolete code paths for cleaner codebases using ts-prune, knip, and ESLint

plugins.name: feature-dev
plugins.description: Enhanced feature development workflow with intelligent multi-agent implementation - automatically parallelizes complex features, maintains functional programming principles (from official Claude Code)

plugins.name: agent-sdk-dev
plugins.description: Claude Agent SDK Development Plugin - tools for creating and verifying Agent SDK applications

plugins.name: commit-commands
plugins.description: Git commit helper commands - commit, commit-push-pr, and clean gone branches

plugins.name: pr-review-toolkit
plugins.description: Comprehensive PR review agents - comments, tests, error handling, type design, code quality, and simplification

plugins.name: security-guidance
plugins.description: Security reminder hook - warns about command injection, XSS, and unsafe code patterns when editing files

plugins.name: feature-flags
plugins.description: Intelligent feature flag detection and implementation - analyzes existing patterns, integrates with feature-dev, supports LaunchDarkly, Unleash, environment-based, config files, database, and pub/sub patterns

plugins.name: image-generator
plugins.description: AI image generation with intelligent prompt engineering - supports Nano Banana (Gemini) and DALL-E with style guide integration, reference style transfer, and variation generation

plugins.name: code-expert-agent
plugins.description: Deep code research agent powered by ChunkHound - performs iterative, comprehensive analysis discovering existing solutions, mapping architectural relationships, and identifying patterns before coding to prevent duplicate implementations

plugins.name: code-review
plugins.description: Automated pull request code review using specialized agents with confidence-based scoring to filter false positives

plugins.name: explanatory-output-style
plugins.description: Adds educational insights about implementation choices and codebase patterns (mimics the deprecated Explanatory output style)

plugins.name: frontend-design
plugins.description: Frontend design skill for UI/UX implementation

plugins.name: hookify
plugins.description: Easily create hooks to prevent unwanted behaviors by analyzing conversation patterns

plugins.name: learning-output-style
plugins.description: Interactive learning mode that requests meaningful code contributions at decision points (mimics the unshipped Learning output style)

plugins.name: plugin-dev
plugins.description: Comprehensive toolkit for developing Claude Code plugins with expert guidance on hooks, MCP integration, plugin structure, and marketplace publishing

plugins.name: ralph-wiggum
plugins.description: Implementation of the Ralph Wiggum technique - continuous self-referential AI loops for interactive iterative development. Run Claude in a while-true loop with the same prompt until task completion
